tool_description:
Chinese food recipes with high-quality images stored on AWS S3 for fast accessibility. Easy to use!
Category: Food
name: Chinese Food DB
title: Chinese Food DB

api_list.name: List of Foods
api_list.description: This endpoint responds with a list of chinese foods that includes their names and images, as well as their IDs, which must be provided in the "Detailed Food Recipe by ID" endpoint to receive the detailed recipe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chinese-food-db.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chinese-food-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detailed Food Recipe by ID
api_list.code:

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chinese-food-db.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chinese-food-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
